Install the app with the trial sn 000-00000000. Then start it and go to Help>>>'About'>>>'Product information'>>>'Activate' and copy the request code into the keygen. You get the activation code which you enter into the proper column in the activation form. Use imaginary serial in the form and confirm..then its done..restart appl. and enjoy

Marvelous job.  For those of you who have no idea what this program is i will give you all a bit of a background/history on it.

Autocad is said to be one of the best architecture/modeling programs ever made.
Autocad has 2 modes.  The first mode is the Classic Mode.  Its allows the user to create elaborate 2D drawings.  This mode is primarily used by architects and engineers.  It is great for making blueprints and floor plans because of its ability to autmaticly measure and mark the length, high, width, area, perimiter, angle, and arch of anything you make.  Autocad started out only being able to use this mode.
  There is a second mode to Autocad and you see the works of this almost on a daily basis.  It is the 3D Modeling mode.  Almost all major game companies use this.  Autocad has one of the most advanced modeling systems.  And thats my basic background on Autocad 2006.

                                -Durantmigo  ACAD WIZ

To get an activation code you have to open keygen.exe and type in a request code. This request code can be found in the same box where you have to fill in your activation code.

Just goes to show you - always run a scan!

works fine for me.
just install autocad 2006 using deamon tools, at start write default 000-0000000 s/n and after installation is complete - run keygen, enter code wich autocad gave you and it will give you activation code. at first 2 blank fields enter code whatever you like. important is only activation code wich has to be written in activation code field (wich is on bottom).

PS my nod32 didnt found any viruses.

good luck.

Thank you to anum_khan707, that was the answer.  The way the autocad registration process works (I did it 5 minutes ago) is that during installation it asks you for a serial, and tells you that if you enter 000-0000000 it will operate temporarily.  When you go to activate it with the Keygen, and it's not a Crack, it's a Keygen, don't call it what it's not, it says to enter your new S/N and then it gives you an Request code, which the included keygen app converts to an Activation Code.  So for that part only, the keygen works, but you still need a valid S/N, and there is no way to get that otherwise, the keygen does not give you that.  The first one worked for me, but try the second and third ones first.  653-12354321 or 666-98989898 or 666-69696969
